page.title: 02HOME LIFE
page.content: Our May Day Holiday. 1. On Saturday I got my weekly comic, the "Eagle". After breakfast my family took me to Gloucester Swimming Baths for my swimming lesson. Then we went to the British Home Stores for lunch. I bought some software for my computer. Later I played on the computer. 2. On May Day my family and I went to Great Mills Do-it-yourself store and bought a lawn mower. Then we got some chipboard and paste and a slate mirror. My father needed them to improve our bedroom and bathroom. Then I looked through some recipe books until teatime. I made a salad with tomatoes, cucumber, cheese, pickles and cold pork. After that I had a game of Patience on my computer. Then I washed the dishes and went to bed.
